summary: Admin Dashboard Refactoring Testing - All 22 refactored admin components tested successfully. Frontend admin pages load correctly with proper Arabic RTL layout after refactoring from monolithic AdminDashboard.js into separate component files.
passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with Arabic RTL layout
Admin login with admin@gamelo.com / Test123! - SUCCESS
Admin Dashboard Overview - Stats displayed (10 users, 2 orders, 60 products, 85.98 JOD revenue)
Admin Sidebar - All 18 navigation links present and working
Products Management (/admin/products) - 50 products displayed, edit button works, dialog opens with 4 tabs
Product Edit Dialog - All tabs work (Basic Info, Product Type, Pricing, Variants)
Categories Management (/admin/categories) - 6 categories displayed with edit/delete buttons
Orders Management (/admin/orders) - 2 orders displayed with search, filter, and edit functionality
Users Management (/admin/users) - 10 users displayed with role badges and status toggles
CMS Management (/admin/cms) - Pages tab (4 pages) and FAQ tab (6 FAQs) working
Site Settings (/admin/settings) - All sections loaded (Logo, Basic Info, Hero, Footer/Social)
Discounts Management (/admin/discounts) - 8 discount codes displayed with status badges
critical_code_review_comments: Refactoring from 3600+ line monolithic file to 22 separate components completed successfully
Component structure follows good separation of concerns

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All admin pages load and function correctly after refactoring)

context_for_next_testing_agent:
Admin dashboard refactoring completed and verified:

1. Component Structure:
   - AdminSidebar.jsx - Sidebar navigation with 18 menu items
   - DashboardStats.jsx - Stats cards component
   - ProductsManagement.jsx - Products CRUD with multi-tab edit dialog
   - CategoriesManagement.jsx - Categories CRUD
   - OrdersManagement.jsx - Orders list with filters and status updates
   - UsersManagement.jsx - Users list with role/status management
   - CMSManagement.jsx - Pages and FAQ management with tabs
   - SiteSettings.jsx - Site configuration settings
   - Plus 14 more components (Wallets, Discounts, Notifications, Tickets, Disputes, Banners, Homepage Sections, Analytics, Audit Logs, Telegram Settings, Roles, Excel Import)

2. All components use shared utilities from shared.js
3. RTL Arabic layout working correctly throughout
4. All navigation links functional
5. Edit dialogs and forms working properly
